LanguageData.VWE_UraniumSlug.label: uranium slug
LanguageData.VWE_UraniumSlug.description: This weapon fires ultra-dense uranium slugs, giving it immense armor-penetrating capabilities, though the heavy recoil increases the time between shots.
LanguageData.VWE_StraightPullAction.label: straight-pull action
LanguageData.VWE_StraightPullAction.description: This weapon uses a linear bolt mechanism to drastically reduce cooldown time, though it compromises long-range stability.
LanguageData.VWE_AccelerationRail.label: acceleration rail
LanguageData.VWE_AccelerationRail.description: Retrofitted with a pulse-charge rail system, this weapon fires a single, high-velocity energy bolt that drastically improves damage and armor penetration.
LanguageData.VWE_CantedIronSights.label: canted iron sights
LanguageData.VWE_CantedIronSights.description: This weapon includes a secondary sight mounted at a 45-degree angle, allowing the sniper to effectively engage targets at close range without using the scope.
LanguageData.VWE_FixedTeleLens.label: fixed tele-lens
LanguageData.VWE_FixedTeleLens.description: This weapon is fitted with extreme magnification optics that significantly extend effective range but render the weapon completely unable to target enemies within a large minimum radius.
